title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and library for running LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) locally with a built-in model registry and OpenAI-compatible API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official async Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, push models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (chat, file upload, RAG, multi-user) that talks to a local Ollama instance.

title: open-webui
summary: Community fork of ollama-webui with added plugins, admin panel, and OpenAI-gateway compatibility.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL and command toolbox (model search, templates, benchmarking) for Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local LLM code completion and chat via Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for running Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (cuda, rocm, cpu) and compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit to chat with PDFs.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin DSL and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with support for chat, embeddings, and tool calling; NuGet package.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js proxy that adds JWT auth, rate-limiting, and OpenAI route compatibility to Ollama.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes and summarize vault content.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative QA and summarization pipelines.

title: ollama-lmstudio-bridge
summary: Bridge that exposes Ollama models inside LM Studio with GPU stats and model switching.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Community mono-repo collecting unofficial SDKs for Go, Ruby, PHP, Swift, and Dart.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that brings local LLM chat, image captioning, and moderation to Discord servers.
